title: Neta Chara Tensei Toka Anmari da! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Shoujo Ai
tags: Adapted to Manga   Artifacts   Beautiful Female Lead   Childcare   Chuunibyou   Contracts   Demi-Humans   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Elves   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Half-human Protagonist   Human Weapon   Humanoid Protagonist   Loli   Magic   Magical Space   Maids   Male to Female   Master-Servant Relationship   Mythical Beasts   Non-linear Storytelling   Orphans   Overpowered Protagonist   Playful Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't
author: Otonashi Kanade   音無奏
description: Take part-time jobs, reduce food expense, sacrifice youth, he continues to whale. Using the game as his only weapon, he, Aikawa Tooru fight against loneliness and boredom. On his way back from one of his part-time job he saved a girl from a recklessly running bus and died just like that. The next time he opened his eyes, somehow he ended up in another world, as one of his characters, Nacht. But that character was created during his dark age, fuelled with eight-grade syndrome desire and passion. This is the story of Tooru's next life as Nacht.>
